markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Red Mantis Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6519) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Prey for Death</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Prey for Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=231) pg. 108

**Archetype** [Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=271)

**Prerequisites**
trained in [sawtooth sabers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=423); worshipper of [Achaekek](/Deities.aspx?ID=325); member of the Red Mantis assassins

**Access**
You are from Mediogalti Island.

</column>

---

You have learned how to stalk your foes and slay them with a sawtooth saber. You become trained in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) and [Assassin Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41); if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency with sawtooth sabers.

 You become bound by [Achaekek's](/Deities.aspx?ID=325) anathema and can receive his sanctification.

<title level="2">Red Mantis Assassin Dedication leads to...</title>
[Crimson Shroud](/Feats.aspx?ID=6521), [Prayer Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=6528)
name: Red Mantis Assassin Dedication
prerequisite: trained in sawtooth sabers; worshipper of Achaekek; member of the Red Mantis assassins
